# R Markdown

why? 1. reproducible - '누가 돌려도 똑같은 결과 얻을 수 있음.'
2. result without code가 필요한 경우, result with code, result with code, idea, ... 수많은 상황 대응.
3. 프레젠테이션, latex 등과도 잘 대응.

how? you should install the `rmarkdown` and `knitr` packages. you should turn in your homework by R markdown and knit it as pdf or html.


## Basics


\_underbar(1)\_ makes italic

\_\_underbar(2)\_\_ makes bold

\`code\` makes code

\^superscript\^ makes superscript

\~subscript\~ makes subscript

## Code Chunks


echo = FALSE option makes display only the output of the code.

eval = FALSE option makes display R code without evaluating it.
